name: Crimson Tide: Operation Online
description: «Crimson Tide : Operation Online» — is a multiplayer online game that combines the features of FPS, combat simulator and RPG.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: 2 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750 TI DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 3 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 64bit Processor: 3 ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 980 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 5 GB available space
